a0cc3d05-5a0b-4199-856a-e7000b49f0f4.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
a0cc3d05-5a0b-4199-856a-e7000b49f0f4.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

e1258404-e51d-4d65-9703-45c353576b0a.name: Oxygen Storage
e1258404-e51d-4d65-9703-45c353576b0a.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

ae444135-5e20-4a0d-b1ac-43004d2f92a9.name: Oxygen Storage
ae444135-5e20-4a0d-b1ac-43004d2f92a9.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

265b7f21-3254-475d-8d7c-e7d1f992872e.name: Oxygen Storage
265b7f21-3254-475d-8d7c-e7d1f992872e.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

19cdaf39-07e4-4373-a7c5-9e3f7e6640f6.name: Oxygen Storage
19cdaf39-07e4-4373-a7c5-9e3f7e6640f6.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

22c5342b-2228-4740-b8d3-fb562227f70e.name: Oxygen Storage
22c5342b-2228-4740-b8d3-fb562227f70e.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

cd39d52c-b6c0-4e18-ace7-515d334a9619.name: High Pain Threshold
cd39d52c-b6c0-4e18-ace7-515d334a9619.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

dd292131-a967-43dd-8b0f-7d493fff701f.name: Diffuse
dd292131-a967-43dd-8b0f-7d493fff701f.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

21fc5e18-097d-4062-9bba-e8b4affb6216.name: Homogenous
21fc5e18-097d-4062-9bba-e8b4affb6216.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

ddef67ff-119c-4075-9c2c-4b982182295e.name: No Blood
ddef67ff-119c-4075-9c2c-4b982182295e.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

ca02f7ed-ba0f-40cf-a934-f426af2924bb.name: No Brain
ca02f7ed-ba0f-40cf-a934-f426af2924bb.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

da4a7d22-5057-45fc-b7e1-0bb92bc54d31.name: No Eyes
da4a7d22-5057-45fc-b7e1-0bb92bc54d31.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

9e42d93a-d256-4d71-846c-23b1d36713dc.name: No Head
9e42d93a-d256-4d71-846c-23b1d36713dc.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

85ebd881-9aea-46bd-b4b9-071947c836e6.name: No Neck
85ebd881-9aea-46bd-b4b9-071947c836e6.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

b10d9769-992f-4002-bd8b-5f17a9bac359.name: No Vitals
b10d9769-992f-4002-bd8b-5f17a9bac359.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

5ea9f71d-4cf7-4568-a5e2-b189a91e06e2.name: Unliving
5ea9f71d-4cf7-4568-a5e2-b189a91e06e2.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
